original_text: And he came to the sheepcotes by the way, where was a cave; and Saul went in to cover his feet: and David and his men remained in the sides of the cave.
korean_text: 길 가 양의 우리에 이른즉 굴이 있는지라 사울이 뒤를 보러 들어가니라 다윗과 그의 사람들이 그 굴 깊은 곳에 있더니

sentences.original_text: And he came to the sheepcotes by the way
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 길가에 있는 양 우리로 왔는데

sentences.original_text: and Saul went in to cover his feet
sentences.korean_translation: 사울이 발을 가리려고 그 안으로 들어갔고

sentences.original_text: and David and his men remained in sides of the cave
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗과 그의 사람들은 굴 구석에 머물렀다
